summary: Implements a full example of training a Mixture Model Network (MoNet) on citation graph datasets with DGL and PyTorch, covering model construction using GMMConv layers, data loading, command‑line configuration, training, and node‑classification evaluation.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation that demonstrates how to apply MoNet for graph learning tasks, enabling researchers and engineers to reproduce benchmark results and integrate the model into their own projects.
